code:
import sys

def tsp(graph, start):
    n = len(graph)
    all_points = set(range(n))
    dp = [[None] * n for _ in range(1 << n)]

    def solve(curr, remaining):
        if remaining == 0:
            return graph[curr][start]
        
        if dp[curr][remaining] is not None:
            return dp[curr][remaining]
        
        ans = sys.maxsize
        for next_point in all_points - set([start, curr]):
            if remaining & (1 << next_point):
                ans = min(ans, graph[curr][next_point] + solve(next_point, remaining & ~(1 << next_point)))
        
        dp[curr][remaining] = ans
        return ans

    return solve(start, (1 << n) - 1)

# Example usage
graph = [[0, 10, 15, 20],
         [10, 0, 35, 25],
         [15, 35, 0, 30],
         [20, 25, 30, 0]]

start_point = 0
print(tsp(graph, start_point))
